sentence.Network_en: The grand piano has been replaced with a small, inelegant electric model.
sentence.Network_cn: 三角钢琴被代之以一架粗鄙的小电子琴。

sentence.Network_en: It is usually nonconstructive, inelegant, hard to generalize.
sentence.Network_cn: 它通常是非构造性的, 不优美的, 难于一般化的.

sentence.Network_en: The analyst could retort only that the geometric proofs were clumsy and inelegant.
sentence.Network_cn: 分析学家却只能回嘴说几何的证明是笨拙而不优美的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(I) ... inelegancy 不雅 inelegant 不雅的 inelegantly 不优美地.

list.abs: listen to some people inelegant voice on the stage , my heart all wants ground .听着台上有些人并不优美的声音，我心都要碎了。
after taking a look on that the daughter college student aha is drunk inelegant behavior !看女大学生喝醉酒后不雅行为！
Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer人们有时要做自己不... inelegant fragment 不雅的片段 cater 迎合 scandal 丑行 deteriorate (使)恶化.
an inelegant gesture , reply ., 有失风雅的姿势 , 答覆.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from French inélégant, from Latin inelegant-, from in- 'not' + Latin elegant- 'fastidious, refined' (see elegant)

entry.tran: 不雅的;粗俗的;不精致的
entry.def: If you say that something is inelegant, you mean that it is not attractive or graceful.

example.ex: The grand piano has been replaced with a small, inelegant electric model.
example.tran: 三角钢琴被代之以一架粗鄙的小电子琴。

means.word_mean: 1. lacking in refinement or grace or good taste

auth_sentence.content: The crane had been designed and built by the authorities, who had decided to cleanse the sky of its inelegant encumbrance.
